content:
I have a rather complex extension as part of a profile. In the differential view of the profile, many of the subextensions aren't being shown. Is there a way to fix this?

Example: https://build.fhir.org/ig/DavidPyke/CEQSubscription/StructureDefinition-CEQsubscription.html
The full set is shown in the snapshot view
Complex extensions follow the same rules as any complex type. They only get expanded if the profile constrains the content
